text: Answer: 46 Solution: In Bttree given, key is 12 byte long block size =1024 byte record pointer = 10 byte Block pointer = 8 byte To find maximum number of keys that can be accommodate in each leaf node. Bk tn*ric 1024 =n*12 +n*10 + 8 1024 = 12n+10n + 8 1024-8 = 22n n=1016/22 = 46.18 = 46 Number of keys = 46
